about_the_game:
Help Javier on his journey to "El Dorado", a city made of gold

-A thought-provoking story about character development and philosophy
-A journey story full of challenging platform challenges across hundreds of screens
- With respawn immediately after death, death is not a punishment in this game, it is the nature of the game.
- Story parts that will help you relax after the enjoyable and tiring platforms
-Very simple to learn gameplay that you will master as more as you play.
-Character controls are as reactive as possible and if you die it's always your fault

"Dear lord you made me poor, I realise it's not shame to be poor. But it's no great honour either. So what would have been so terrible if ı had a small fortune."

Help Javier on his journey to "El Dorado", a city made of gold

-Character controls are as reactive as possible and if you die it's always your fault

"Dear lord you made me poor, I realise it's not shame to be poor. But it's no great honour either. So what would have been so terrible if ı had a small fortune."
name: JAVIER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 800 MHz Intel Pentium III or 800 MHz AMD Athlon
  • Memory: 96 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT / Radeon HD 7310G.
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Fully DirectX compatible Sound Card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 800 MHz Intel Pentium III or 800 MHz AMD Athlon
  • Memory: 96 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT / Radeon HD 7310G.
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Fully DirectX compatible Sound Card.

short_description: Help Javier on his journey to "El Dorado", a city made of gold, in this super platform game with hundreds of challenging and addictive platform screens. See the reasons for his ambition and question his decisions with him.
